snippet: In our third annual listing of college admissions statistics, we include the number of students who were placed on wait lists, as well as a more in-depth look at acceptance rates.
abstract: In our third annual listing of college admissions statistics, we include the number of students who were placed on wait lists, as well as a more in-depth look at acceptance rates.

headline.main: A First Draft of 2012 Admissions Decisions at Dozens of Universities
